zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，关注关键支撑位]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在12.1068美元附近交易，展现出一定的震荡整理趋势。过去24小时内价格小幅下跌0.19%，显示出市场买卖力量相对平衡。短期内，价格波动在12.0981至12.1744区间，反映出市场的暂时犹豫。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI未能提供当前数据，但MACD值为-0.077，显示出市场可能存在一定的卖压。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）在12.19886附近，将成为短期内的一个重要阻力位。如果价格反弹突破此水平，可能会引发新的买入信号。

在支撑位方面，12.0981美元是当前关键支撑位，如果价格跌破该水平，可能会引发更多的抛售压力，进一步向下测试11.80美元。投资者应密切关注这一水平的表现，以便及时调整交易策略。

综合来看，建议投资者在当前区间内采取谨慎策略，观望市场动向。如果价格突破12.19886美元，可以考虑适度增持，反之则需关注支撑位的保护，避免潜在的损失。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $12.1068, reflecting a slight decline of 0.19% over the last 24 hours. This minor downturn, while not alarming, suggests that the price is struggling to maintain momentum after reaching a high of $12.1744. The recent low of $12.0981 indicates a potential support level that traders may closely monitor. A break below this level could signal further bearish sentiment, while a bounce back could indicate resilience.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of a current RSI value makes it challenging to assess overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD shows a negative value of -0.0773, which could suggest bearish momentum in the short term. Traders should be cautious, as a sustained negative MACD could lead to further selling pressure. The SMA(20) at $12.1989 is also pivotal; if AVAX can reclaim this level, it may indicate a bullish reversal.

Support and resistance levels are crucial for traders considering entry or exit points. The immediate support at $12.0981 is critical; if breached, traders might target the next support level around $11.80. Conversely, resistance sits at the SMA(20) of $12.1989, which, if surpassed, could lead to a rally towards $12.50. Monitoring these levels can provide insight into potential price action.

For trading strategies, it may be prudent to adopt a wait-and-see approach. If AVAX successfully bounces off the support level, buying opportunities could arise, especially if accompanied by stronger volume. Conversely, if the price breaks below the support, traders may consider short positions or wait for a more favorable entry point. Keeping an eye on broader market trends and news will also be essential in navigating this evolving landscape.
